nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, a Lutrillian prisoner was being held in the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center in the Galactic City on Coruscant. He wore an orange prison jumpsuit.

One day, the Lutrillian sat by a Trandoshan prisoner in the detention center's mess hall when he noticed Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi enter the room, disguised as the Human bounty hunter Rako Hardeen. The Lutrillian whispered something to the Trandoshan, who suggested that Hardeen did not appear particularly tough.
